product_description: MP MUSCLEPHARM, ASSAULT, ENERGY + STRENGTH, THE ATHLETES PRE-WORKOUT, GREEN APPLE,  11.75 OZ (O.73 LBS) (333G), Exclusively Developed & Manufactured for: MusclePharm Corp., 721 Ironton St., Denver, CO 80239, UPC 6 53341 04601
reason_for_recall: A raw material initially failed testing Staphylococcus aureus. A retest was conducted with passing results but an out of specification investigation was not properly conducted leaving concern that the finished product could contain the bacterium.

reason_for_recall: On 02/03/2023, FRESH IDEATION FOOD GROUP, LLC dba Fresh Creative Cuisine of Baltimore, MD is  initiating a recall of  various products sold from January 24, 2023 through January 30, 2023 because the products have the potential to be contaminated with Listeria monocytogenes .
